tsh_test module¶

tsh_test.diagnose_tsh(line)¶

Uses TSH data to diagnose hypo- and hyperthyroidism

Any test result < 1.0 indicates hyperthyroidism, while any test result > 4.0 indicates hypothyroidism. Normal thyroid function is defined as all blood TSH levels between 1.0 and 4.0, inclusive.

Parameters

line (list) – blood TSH levels as floats

Returns

TSH diagnosis

Return type

string

tsh_test.edit_txt(lines)¶

Edit txt file of patient data to remove

Patient data file contains information for an unspecified number of patients with each line of text separated by a newline.

Parameters

lines (list) – all patient data

Returns

all patient data without newlines

Return type

list

tsh_test.extract_tsh(line)¶

Cleans TSH txt line to remove ‘header’ and convert data type

TSH test results include levels of Thyroid Stimulating Hormone (TSH) in the blood. Several levels were collected for each patient.

Parameters

line (str) – TSH txt file with format “tsh, 1, 2, 3, etc”

Returns

TSH test results as list of floats

Return type

list

tsh_test.read_txt(input_txt)¶

Read txt file of patient data

Patient data file contains information for an unspecified number of patients, including name, age, gender, and TSH test results.

Parameters

input_txt (txt) – text file of patient data

Returns

all patient data without newlines

Return type

list

tsh_test.save_json(patient)¶

Saves each patient’s data in JSON format

Patient data is saved under ‘FirstName-LastName.json’ format with the following info: First Name (str), Last Name (str), Age (int), Gender (str), Diagnosis (str), TSH (list of floats).

Parameters

patient (dict) – Patient information separated into keys-value pairs

Returns

categorized data and test results for each patient

Return type

JSON

tsh_test.single_patient(data_input)¶

Parse patient data into specified categories

Patient data file must be separated into First Name, Last Name, Age, Gender, Diagnosis, and TSH test results.

Parameters

data_input (list) – all patient data

Returns

categorized data and test results for each patient

Return type

JSON
